casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Tyson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Tyson (1985), 20 Ohio St. 3d 40.]

(No. 85-127 Decided November 20, 1985.) Gary Radanof assistant prosecutor, for appellee. Teodosio, Cherpas & Manos and Christopher T. Cherpas, for appellant.

The judgment in this cause, having been certified by the court of appeals in case No. 11723 as being in conflict with State v. Emch (1982), 7 Ohio App. 3d 7, is affirmed on authority of State v. Boyd (1985), 16 Ohio St. 3d 7, and State v. Ward (1984), 15 Ohio St. 3d 355.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, C. Brown, Douglas and Wright, JJ., concur.
